DOC.brief_summary: This is an interim report for POC testing of skyla Clinical Chemistry Analyzer and four skyla Test Systems (ALB, BUN, GLU, and TP). The analyses are performed with skyla Clinical Chemistry Analyzer. Analyte Principle: Albumin (ALB) - Dye-Binding BCG Blood urea nitrogen (BUN) - Urease with GLDH (coupled enzyme) Glucose (GLU) - Hexokinase, Colorimetry Total Protein (TP) - Biuret
DOC.brief_title: Performance Evaluation of In-Vitro Diagnostic Device
DOC.criteria: You must be an adult over 20 years of age and weigh over 50 kg to be eligible to participate in the study. You may not participate in this study if you do not meet the above inclusion criteria.
